name: Solitek Cells
goal: Soli Tek is an established Eurupean manufacturer and distributor of PV cells and modules with HQ and production plant in Vilnius, Lithuania. We have developed an advanced brand in the solar energy industry, providing high quality European made products for both private and commercial sectors. Our mission is to produce and supply technologically advanced and competitive solar energy products ensuring quality and control over the production and delivery process. Our vision - to become the leading brand in Europe, producing and supplying high quality PV modules for B2B customer network.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, External Relations, Trade
euInitiatives: Protectionist policies against imports of solar cells, including anti – subsidy and anti – dumping programs
